import React from 'react' import { saveToken } from '../reducers/userReducer' import { useDispatch } from 'react-redux' import { setErrorNotification } from '../reducers/notificationReducer' import { useHistory } from "react-router-dom" const LoginForm = () => { const dispatch = useDispatch() const history = useHistory() const handleLogin = async (event) => { event.preventDefault() const username = event.target.username.value const password = event.target.password.value dispatch(saveToken(username, password)) .catch(() => { dispatch(setErrorNotification('Wrong username or password', 5)) }) history.push('/') } return (

login to application

username:
password:
) } export default LoginForm
